description: Try our easy to follow Chocolate-Coated Honeycomb Bites recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chocolate-Coated Honeycomb Bites Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Working quickly, add bicarboate of soda, stirring with a wooden spoon to combine. Pour into pan. Set aside to cool completely. Break into 3cm pieces. Combine chocolate and coconut oil. Dip honeycomb pieces into chocolate to half cover. Place on a wire rack set over a tray. Scatter with nuts. Leave to set. Store in a sealed container and keep in a cool place. Best eaten within a few days.
